same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-- Two vectors of the same norm are on the same ray if and only if they are equal. -/
theorem same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq (h : «expr‖ ‖» x = «expr‖ ‖» y) : same_ray (exprℝ) x y ↔ x = y :=
  by
  obtain rfl | hy := eq_or_ne y 0
  · rw [norm_zero, norm_eq_zero] at h
    exact iff_of_true (same_ray.zero_right _) h
  · exact ⟨fun hxy => norm_inj_on_ray_right hy hxy same_ray.rfl h, fun hxy => hxy ▸ same_ray.rfl⟩
#align same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq
same_ray_iff_norm_smul_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem same_ray_iff_norm_smul_eq : same_ray (exprℝ) x y ↔ «expr • » («expr‖ ‖» x) y = «expr • » («expr‖ ‖» y) x :=
  ⟨same_ray.norm_smul_eq, fun h =>
    or_iff_not_imp_left.2 fun hx =>
      or_iff_not_imp_left.2 fun hy => ⟨«expr‖ ‖» y, «expr‖ ‖» x, norm_pos_iff.2 hy, norm_pos_iff.2 hx, h.symm⟩⟩
#align same_ray_iff_norm_smul_eq same_ray_iff_norm_smul_eq
same_ray_iff_inv_norm_smul_eq_of_ne:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- Two nonzero vectors `x y` in a real normed space are on the same ray if and only if the unit
vectors `‖x‖⁻¹ • x` and `‖y‖⁻¹ • y` are equal. -/
theorem same_ray_iff_inv_norm_smul_eq_of_ne (hx : x ≠ 0) (hy : y ≠ 0) :
    same_ray (exprℝ) x y ↔ «expr • » («expr‖ ‖» x)⁻¹ x = «expr • » («expr‖ ‖» y)⁻¹ y := by
  rw [inv_smul_eq_iff₀, smul_comm, eq_comm, inv_smul_eq_iff₀, same_ray_iff_norm_smul_eq] <;> rwa [norm_ne_zero_iff]
#align same_ray_iff_inv_norm_smul_eq_of_ne same_ray_iff_inv_norm_smul_eq_of_ne
same_ray_iff_inv_norm_smul_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- Two vectors `x y` in a real normed space are on the ray if and only if one of them is zero or
the unit vectors `‖x‖⁻¹ • x` and `‖y‖⁻¹ • y` are equal. -/
theorem same_ray_iff_inv_norm_smul_eq :
    same_ray (exprℝ) x y ↔ x = 0 ∨ y = 0 ∨ «expr • » («expr‖ ‖» x)⁻¹ x = «expr • » («expr‖ ‖» y)⁻¹ y :=
  by
  rcases eq_or_ne x 0 with (rfl | hx); · simp [same_ray.zero_left]
  rcases eq_or_ne y 0 with (rfl | hy); · simp [same_ray.zero_right]
  simp only [same_ray_iff_inv_norm_smul_eq_of_ne hx hy, *, false_or_iff]
#align same_ray_iff_inv_norm_smul_eq same_ray_iff_inv_norm_smul_eq
not_same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem not_same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq (h : «expr‖ ‖» x = «expr‖ ‖» y) : ¬same_ray (exprℝ) x y ↔ x ≠ y :=
  (same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq h).not
#align not_same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq not_same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq
norm_sub:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem norm_sub (h : same_ray (exprℝ) x y) : «expr‖ ‖» (x - y) = |«expr‖ ‖» x - «expr‖ ‖» y| :=
  by
  rcases h.exists_eq_smul with ⟨u, a, b, ha, hb, -, rfl, rfl⟩
  wlog (discharger := tactic.skip) hab : b ≤ a := le_total b a using a b, b a
  · rw [← sub_nonneg] at hab
    rw [← sub_smul, norm_smul_of_nonneg hab, norm_smul_of_nonneg ha, norm_smul_of_nonneg hb, ← sub_mul,
      abs_of_nonneg (mul_nonneg hab (norm_nonneg _))]
  · intro ha hb hab
    rw [norm_sub_rev, this hb ha hab.symm, abs_sub_comm]
#align norm_sub norm_sub
norm_smul_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
theorem norm_smul_eq (h : same_ray (exprℝ) x y) : «expr • » («expr‖ ‖» x) y = «expr • » («expr‖ ‖» y) x :=
  by
  rcases h.exists_eq_smul with ⟨u, a, b, ha, hb, -, rfl, rfl⟩
  simp only [norm_smul_of_nonneg, *, mul_smul, smul_comm («expr‖ ‖» u)]
  apply smul_comm
#align norm_smul_eq norm_smul_eq
norm_inj_on_ray_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem norm_inj_on_ray_right (hy : y ≠ 0) : { x | same_ray (exprℝ) x y }.inj_on norm := by
  simpa only [same_ray_comm] using norm_inj_on_ray_left hy
#align norm_inj_on_ray_right norm_inj_on_ray_right
norm_inj_on_ray_left:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem norm_inj_on_ray_left (hx : x ≠ 0) : { y | same_ray (exprℝ) x y }.inj_on norm :=
  by
  rintro y hy z hz h
  rcases hy.exists_nonneg_left hx with ⟨r, hr, rfl⟩
  rcases hz.exists_nonneg_left hx with ⟨s, hs, rfl⟩
  rw [norm_smul, norm_smul, mul_left_inj' (norm_ne_zero_iff.2 hx), norm_of_nonneg hr, norm_of_nonneg hs] at h
  rw [h]
#align norm_inj_on_ray_left norm_inj_on_ray_left
norm_eq_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- The norms of two vectors on the same ray are equal if and only if they are equal. -/
theorem same_ray.norm_eq_iff (h : same_ray (exprℝ) x y) : «expr‖ ‖» x = «expr‖ ‖» y ↔ x = y :=
  ⟨h.eq_of_norm_eq, fun h => h ▸ rfl⟩
#align same_ray.norm_eq_iff same_ray.norm_eq_iff
norm_add:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2022 Yury Kudryashov. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Yury Kudryashov, Yaël Dillies
-/
/-- If `x` and `y` are on the same ray, then the triangle inequality becomes the equality: the norm
of `x + y` is the sum of the norms of `x` and `y`. The converse is true for a strictly convex
space. -/
theorem norm_add (h : same_ray (exprℝ) x y) : «expr‖ ‖» (x + y) = «expr‖ ‖» x + «expr‖ ‖» y :=
  by
  rcases h.exists_eq_smul with ⟨u, a, b, ha, hb, -, rfl, rfl⟩
  rw [← add_smul, norm_smul_of_nonneg (add_nonneg ha hb), norm_smul_of_nonneg ha, norm_smul_of_nonneg hb, add_mul]
#align norm_add norm_add
eq_of_norm_eq:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr‖ ‖» -/
/-- If two points on the same ray have the same norm, then they are equal. -/
theorem same_ray.eq_of_norm_eq (h : same_ray (exprℝ) x y) (hn : «expr‖ ‖» x = «expr‖ ‖» y) : x = y :=
  (same_ray_iff_of_norm_eq hn).mp h
#align same_ray.eq_of_norm_eq same_ray.eq_of_norm_eq
